SEARCH
Package complex_classes

Class ComplexQubit

java.lang.Object
complex_classes.ComplexObject
complex_classes.ComplexQubit
public class ComplexQubit extends ComplexObject
This class represents a single qubit. It uses ComplexNumbers so that 'i' can be used for qubit alpha and beta values to track probabilities.
Since:
25 June 2024
Version:
0.1
Author:
Robert Smith

    • ComplexQubit

      public ComplexQubit(ComplexNumber aVec, ComplexNumber bVec, int qubitID)
      Parameterized constructor for the qubit class when loading from a file, but not used elsewhere
      Parameters:
      aVec - the |0> vector
      bVec - the |1> vector
      qubitID - the ID for this qubit specified when loading a file from the saved qubit record
